events.name: South Africa issues blanket diplomatic immunity for August summit
events.wd_label: South Africa issues blanket diplomatic immunity for August summit
events.wd_description: South Africa issued blanket diplomatic immunity to all leaders attending an August summit, potentially allowing Russian President Vladimir Putin to visit without fear of arrest on an ICC warrant.
events.description: South Africa issued blanket diplomatic immunity to all leaders attending an August summit, potentially allowing Russian President Vladimir Putin to visit without fear of arrest on an ICC warrant.

events.name: BRICS summit details
events.wd_description: South Africa will host a summit of BRICS groups (Brazil, China, India, Russia, and South Africa) in August, with a planning meeting of foreign ministers expected to take place on Thursday.
events.description: South Africa will host a summit of BRICS groups (Brazil, China, India, Russia, and South Africa) in August, with a planning meeting of foreign ministers expected to take place on Thursday.

events.name: Department of Foreign Affairs' statement
events.wd_description: The Department of Foreign Affairs backed the immunity, stating it is a standard conferment for all international conferences and summits held in South Africa and is not for specific individuals.
events.description: The Department of Foreign Affairs backed the immunity, stating it is a standard conferment for all international conferences and summits held in South Africa and is not for specific individuals.

events.name: Syria readmitted into the Arab League
events.wd_label: Syria readmitted into the Arab League
events.wd_description: The Arab League's foreign ministers adopted a decision to readmit Syria into the league after more than a decade of suspension.
events.description: The Arab League's foreign ministers adopted a decision to readmit Syria into the league after more than a decade of suspension.

events.name: Immediate effect of readmission
events.wd_description: Syria could resume its participation in Arab League meetings with immediate effect.
events.description: Syria could resume its participation in Arab League meetings with immediate effect.

events.name: Call for resolution of Syrian crisis
events.wd_label: Call for resolution of Syrian crisis
events.wd_description: The Arab League called for a resolution of the crisis resulting from Syria’s civil war, including the flight of refugees and drug smuggling across the region.
events.description: The Arab League called for a resolution of the crisis resulting from Syria’s civil war, including the flight of refugees and drug smuggling across the region.

events.name: Formation of ministerial contact group
events.wd_description: Jordan, Saudi Arabia, Iraq, Lebanon, Egypt, and the Secretary General of the Arab League would form a ministerial contact group to liaise with the Syrian government and seek a steady solution to the crisis.
events.description: Jordan, Saudi Arabia, Iraq, Lebanon, Egypt, and the Secretary General of the Arab League would form a ministerial contact group to liaise with the Syrian government and seek a steady solution to the crisis.

events.name: Extreme Weather and Smoke Pollution Affect Vast Regions of the United States
events.wd_label: Extreme Weather and Smoke Pollution Affect Vast Regions of the United States
events.wd_description: Large parts of the United States are facing extreme weather, with triple-digit temperatures in the south and southwest and widespread smoke pollution in the Midwest due to fires in northern Quebec. Over 80 million people are under air quality warnings, and more than 40 million are under excessive heat notifications.
events.description: Large parts of the United States are facing extreme weather, with triple-digit temperatures in the south and southwest and widespread smoke pollution in the Midwest due to fires in northern Quebec. Over 80 million people are under air quality warnings, and more than 40 million are under excessive heat notifications.

events.name: Extreme Heat in Southern and Southwestern US
events.wd_label: Extreme Heat in Southern and Southwestern US
events.wd_description: Temperatures in the southern and southwestern United States have reached triple digits, with a heat dome contributing to widespread excessive heat warnings affecting more than 40 million Americans.
events.description: Temperatures in the southern and southwestern United States have reached triple digits, with a heat dome contributing to widespread excessive heat warnings affecting more than 40 million Americans.

events.name: Smoke Pollution in the Midwest
events.wd_description: Smoke from fires in northern Quebec has caused significant air pollution across the Midwest, with smoke being carried southward by a north wind, affecting regions including southern Illinois, Indiana, and Kentucky.
events.description: Smoke from fires in northern Quebec has caused significant air pollution across the Midwest, with smoke being carried southward by a north wind, affecting regions including southern Illinois, Indiana, and Kentucky.

events.name: Warnings and Public Health Precautions
events.wd_description: Over 80 million people are under air quality warnings, with officials in cities like Chicago advising vulnerable populations to stay indoors. Daycare and sports centers have also taken precautions to protect children from the smoke.
events.description: Over 80 million people are under air quality warnings, with officials in cities like Chicago advising vulnerable populations to stay indoors. Daycare and sports centers have also taken precautions to protect children from the smoke.

events.name: Shanghai Auto Show 2023
events.wd_description: The Shanghai Auto Show is opening after being canceled last year due to China's zero-COVID curbs, featuring numerous Chinese and foreign automakers unveiling their latest models and technologies, especially EVs.
events.description: The Shanghai Auto Show is opening after being canceled last year due to China's zero-COVID curbs, featuring numerous Chinese and foreign automakers unveiling their latest models and technologies, especially EVs.

events.name: Chinese automakers
events.wd_description: Chinese firms like BYD, Geely, and Nio are displaying a range of electric vehicles to strengthen their position in the world's largest auto and EV market.
events.description: Chinese firms like BYD, Geely, and Nio are displaying a range of electric vehicles to strengthen their position in the world's largest auto and EV market.

events.name: Global EV trends
events.wd_description: EVs are becoming central in the global auto scene due to ambitious e-mobility plans and government support amid climate change concerns.
events.description: EVs are becoming central in the global auto scene due to ambitious e-mobility plans and government support amid climate change concerns.

events.name: US EV policy
events.wd_description: The Biden administration proposes new rules to cut pollution from automobiles, requiring up to two-thirds of new vehicles sold in the US to be electric by 2032.
events.description: The Biden administration proposes new rules to cut pollution from automobiles, requiring up to two-thirds of new vehicles sold in the US to be electric by 2032.

events.name: EU EV policy
events.wd_description: The EU aims to speed up the switch to EVs by effectively banning the sale of new petrol and diesel cars from 2035.
events.description: The EU aims to speed up the switch to EVs by effectively banning the sale of new petrol and diesel cars from 2035.

events.name: Investment in EVs and batteries
events.wd_description: The world's top automakers plan to invest nearly $1.2 trillion in EVs and batteries through 2030, with battery-powered cars' share in total auto sales projected to rise significantly.
events.description: The world's top automakers plan to invest nearly $1.2 trillion in EVs and batteries through 2030, with battery-powered cars' share in total auto sales projected to rise significantly.

events.name: Demand for EV batteries
events.wd_description: The surge in demand for EV batteries is prompting governments and companies to secure adequate supplies, with China leading in battery tech and production.
events.description: The surge in demand for EV batteries is prompting governments and companies to secure adequate supplies, with China leading in battery tech and production.

events.name: China's dominance in battery tech
events.wd_description: China accounts for almost 75% of global battery manufacturing capacity, controlling various stages of the supply chain from mining to final assembly.
events.description: China accounts for almost 75% of global battery manufacturing capacity, controlling various stages of the supply chain from mining to final assembly.

events.name: US reliance on Chinese batteries
events.wd_description: Many Western automakers like Tesla and General Motors rely on Chinese firms like CATL for their battery needs, despite geopolitical tensions.
events.description: Many Western automakers like Tesla and General Motors rely on Chinese firms like CATL for their battery needs, despite geopolitical tensions.

events.name: US policy on EV battery supply
events.wd_label: US policy on EV battery supply
events.wd_description: The Inflation Reduction Act aims to reduce reliance on Chinese battery cells by providing subsidies and tax breaks for US-made EVs and batteries.
events.description: The Inflation Reduction Act aims to reduce reliance on Chinese battery cells by providing subsidies and tax breaks for US-made EVs and batteries.

events.name: EU battery industry
events.wd_description: The EU has been pushing for a domestic EV battery industry, with the European Battery Alliance launched in 2017 to meet the region's battery needs by 2030.
events.description: The EU has been pushing for a domestic EV battery industry, with the European Battery Alliance launched in 2017 to meet the region's battery needs by 2030.

events.name: EU investment in battery production
events.wd_description: European companies like Volkswagen are investing in mines and battery plants to secure raw materials and scale up production.
events.description: European companies like Volkswagen are investing in mines and battery plants to secure raw materials and scale up production.

events.name: Future of EV battery industry
events.wd_description: The EV battery industry is in flux, with European firms having an opportunity to catch up by focusing on new technologies like solid-state batteries.
events.description: The EV battery industry is in flux, with European firms having an opportunity to catch up by focusing on new technologies like solid-state batteries.
